name: The Scar and Toph Game
description:
You've watched them. Now play alongside them. Scar and Toph star in BAFTA-nominated superhit, The Scar and Toph Game. As THE SPIRIT OF MELEE, you must build the hype and help cast the sickest tournament of all time. Your choices affect the past, present, and future of the world's greatest competitive party game featuring Nintendo characters. Features include:

Four different endings

Scar

Toph

... And much more.


Made by the Don't Forget Our eSports Dream Team as part of a weird marketing gimmick. Back our Kickstarter.
